sentences: Tunni jooksul saavad kõik lõpetada tööd.
Päeva jooksul on meil palju tegemist.
context: The Estonian postposition 'jooksul' is used to indicate a time period during which something happens or continues. It translates to English words like 'during', 'throughout', or 'in the course of'. This word typically appears in genitive case constructions (e.g., 'aja jooksul' - 'during time/hour'). The word can be translated as 'aasta jooksul' (during the year), 'tunni jooksul' (during the hour), or 'päeva jooksul' (during the day).
